mainType.description: Specifies which config to use as main. Important when clashes occur.

key.description: Key used in paths that specified the drive. Can be mapped based on matched drive from check object.

path.description: Path to a file or directory that always exists

key.description: Key used in paths that specified the drive. Can be mapped based on matched drive from check object.

path.description: Path to a file or directory that always exists

assets.description: Path to directory of flat OR nested hierarchy of asset files.

binaries.description: Path to directory of flat hierarchy of binaries.

shortcuts.description: Path to directory with flat hierarchy of shortcuts.

temp.description: Path to directory of temporary data. Temporary data is considered DELETABLE.

backup.description: Path to directory of backup data.

issues.description: Path to directory of flat OR nested hierarchy of issue files.

management.description: Path to directory of management. Expects directly of format ManagementSettings.
